# kvImageGamma_UseGammaValue

**Global Variable**

A user-defined gamma value with full-precision calculation.

## Declaration

```swift
var kvImageGamma_UseGammaValue: Int { get }
```

## User-defined gamma values

- **kvImageGamma_UseGammaValue_half_precision**: A user-defined gamma value with half-precision calculation.
